snippet: Newt Gingrich's aids said nothing should be read in to the candidate's decision to schedule a press conference rather than a traditional rally after the caucus returns come in.
abstract: Newt Gingrich's aids said nothing should be read in to the candidate's decision to schedule a press conference rather than a traditional rally after the caucus returns come in.
lead_paragraph: 8:58 p.m. | Updated LAS VEGAS -- Because Newt Gingrich has scheduled a press conference for Saturday night rather than a traditional rally after the caucus returns come in, rumors have been flying that he will announce his withdrawal from the race. They were fueled by his light schedule of public appearances in Nevada since he arrived after a decisive defeat in Florida.
